name: MobilePolice
description:
You play as a antivirus (in a shape of boy) tring to delet an unkown store for apps that has been downloaded by it self and cause the phone to run out of space .

its a hack and slash platformer game .

you as antivirus will defeat the monsters virus.

cactus give you more damage.

the hearts for health.

and dont forget to collect donatos you will need it.
